body_html:
@peterjc123 Thank you very much and my build ends with an error:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.11.25503\include\xcall_once.h(18): note: see declaration of 'std::once_flag'
C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch/csrc/utils/auto_gpu.h(27): warning C4244: 'argument': conversion from 'int64_t' to 'int', possible loss of data
C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch/csrc/jit/type.h(64): warning C4244: 'initializing': conversion from 'int64_t' to 'int', possible loss of data
C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch/csrc/jit/ir.h(690): warning C4244: 'argument': conversion from 'int64_t' to 'int', possible loss of data
error: command 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.11.25503\bin\HostX64\x86\cl.exe' failed with exit status 2

I guess I had better wait for that pass.

body:
@peterjc123 Thank you very much and my build ends with an error:

> C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.11.25503\include\xcall_once.h(18): note: see declaration of 'std::once_flag'
> C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch/csrc/utils/auto_gpu.h(27): warning C4244: 'argument': conversion from 'int64_t' to 'int', possible loss of data
> C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch/csrc/jit/type.h(64): warning C4244: 'initializing': conversion from 'int64_t' to 'int', possible loss of data
> C:\Users\v-yuclin\workspace\pytorch\torch/csrc/jit/ir.h(690): warning C4244: 'argument': conversion from 'int64_t' to 'int', possible loss of data
> **error**: command 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Visual Studio\\2017\\Enterprise\\VC\\Tools\\MSVC\\14.11.25503\\bin\\HostX64\\x86\\cl.exe' failed with exit status 2

I guess I had better wait for that pass.
